courseName: International Real Estate Investment and Finance MSc
facultyName: School of Architecture, Design and the Built Environment
description: This degree is designed for those looking to specialise in global property investment, finance and business. With a focus on real estate markets and institutions, you’ll develop the competencies necessary to work on both the advisory side and client side for investors.Through applied projects, site visits and visiting industry experts, we’ll equip you with the knowledge of international property markets, finance, valuation, appraisal, real estate economics and real estate management and agency.Who is this course designed
duration: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
